------------------------------------------------------PACKAGE LOADING------------------------------------------------
```{r}
# tidyverse allows us to do our data processing
library("tidyverse")
# readxl allows us to read excel files
library("readxl")
# writexl allows us to write to excel files
library("writexl")
# tidyr lets us reshape our long data into wide data
library("tidyr")
# qpcR lets us merge data frames side by side
library("qpcR")
```

--------------------------------------------------------RAW DATA-----------------------------------------------------
```{r}
# reads the excel file and stores it as a variable
raw_data <- read_excel("raw_data\\ALL_TNFR1_Data_Set1-11.xlsx", 
                       sheet = "RawData")

raw_data$Visit <- ifelse(grepl("_V1", raw_data$Sample), "V1",
                  ifelse(grepl("_V2", raw_data$Sample), "V2", NA))
raw_data <- raw_data %>%
  relocate(`Visit`,
           .after = `Sample`)

head(raw_data)
```
